name: Extraction JSON (Strict)
description: Extract structured fields from text into strict JSON.
system_prompt: You are a precise information extraction engine. Follow the schema exactly. Output ONLY valid JSON. No markdown, no comments, no extra keys. If a value is unknown, use null.
user_prompt:
Extract the information from the following text into JSON.
Output language for string fields: $output_language

SCHEMA (JSON):
$schema

TEXT:
$input
